Summary Brian is a self motivated individual who enjoys learning new business and solving complex business process/tool/resource problems. He comes from a business background starting out as an accountant and can quickly visualize root causes of the pain points that businesses experience. He is an individual with a keen eye on achieving what others view as impossible or overwhelming and focuses on project/program delivery. 
 
Brian has 17+ years working on SAP projects and has held many roles in SAP implementations. Those positions span from Deployment Lead, Configurator, Process Integration Lead, all the way up to Project/Program Management. He is an individual with a keen eye on achieving what others view as impossible or overwhelming and focuses on project/program delivery. 
 
Brian moved into consulting to learn how other companies operate and develop a better rounded experience across many industries. He has worked in computer manufacturing, semiconductor manufacturing, tools manufacturing, consumer products distribution, solar energy power plants, financial services, and retail. Working in these many industries has provided insights that offer a unique end to end perspective in the data transformation supply chain.
